LanguageData.DMS_Ship_TransportShuttleIncoming.label: heavy transport lifter (incoming)
LanguageData.DMS_Ship_TransportShuttleLeaving.label: heavy transport lifter (leaving)
LanguageData.DMS_Shuttle.label: crew transport shuttle
LanguageData.DMS_Shuttle.description: A light transport shuttle designed for transit between surface and orbit, it can lift up to 2 tons of cargo in flight.
